channel.title: Providence Pk's Spawn + Master + PK.Login Pk Old School Bridding with New School
channel.description:
Providence Bringing Back Old School with a touch of New School Bridding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/85GQ5.png[/img] 100% PVP 100% Switching Spawn PK Master! and much more.
[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?x048cdbd6xmtcge] [img]http://www.mouserunner.com/images/MR_MTG_Download.png[/img] [/URL]
[B]I am looking for staff![/B] Graphic's Designer - Open Programmer - Open Website Designer - Open Staff to keep server on check - Open
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CaITp.png[/img]
Better combat system Player Attack & Follow clipping Most Exploits fixed Cheat Client Patched Hyperion Core New hp bars/fading/x10 toggle Clan chats 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. 100% Switching Pk Point shop All Pking spots in mage book teleport. quest tab pk information. Titles Correct food & Pot delay Everything needed for a pk server. Amazing features added to pking to make the experience funner
I will be adding more [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/23h8zn4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/r762yr.jpg[/img]
